titles: The diuell of the vault. Or, The vnmasking of murther in a briefe declaration of the Cacolicke-complotted [sic] treason, lately discouerd: I.H.
author: I. H., fl. 1616.
Heath, John, Fellow of New College, Oxford, attributed name.
publisher: Printed by E. A[llde] for Nathnaiell [sic] Butter, and are to be solde at his shop neere Paules Churchyard, at Saint Austens Gate,
notes: Sometimes doubtfully attributed to John Heath.
Running title reads: The vnmasking of murther.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
